name: collect.js

scripts.all: npm run build && npm test && npm run eslint
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run bundle.development && npm run bundle.production && npm run readme
scripts.coverage: npm run transpile && nyc mocha test/tests.js
scripts.eslint: npm run eslint:js && npm run eslint:md
scripts.eslint:md: eslint --fix --ext md README.md docs/ --rule strict:off --rule no-undef:off --rule no-unused-vars:off --rule func-names:off --rule no-console:off --rule consistent-return:off --rule import/no-unresolved:off --rule import/extensions:off --parser-options sourceType:module
